attributes.action: Make it so lgbtq equal rights come before peoples religious beliefs.
attributes.background: Although the uk has the equality act, with whats been going on in birmingham  regarding the no outsiders programme, i think this amendment/added law is needed so that religion can not be hidden behind or used to promote prejudice and discrimination, especially in schools.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253106
